titles.title: Shawna Hill Post 9/11 Education Benefits Transferability Act
Shawna Hill Post 9/11 Education Benefits Transferability Act

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the transfer of unused Post-9/11 Educational Assistance benefits to additional dependents upon the death of the originally designated dependent.
Shawna Hill Post 9/11 Education Benefits Transferability Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Shawna Hill Post 9/11 Education Benefits Transferability Act
This bill authorizes the reassignment a veteran's or Armed Forces member's Post-9/11 education benefits to another eligible dependent in cases where the original designated beneficiary dies without having used all of such benefits.
Such provision shall apply to deaths occurring on or after August 1, 2009.
